sentences.pinyin: Zhè ge bǐng gān hěn cuì.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我不喜欢吃太脆的炸鸡皮，它会扎伤我的喉咙。
sentences.traditionalText: 我不喜歡吃太脆的炸雞皮，它會扎傷我的喉嚨。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ bùxǐhuān chī tài cuì de zhá jī pí, tā huì zhā shāng wǒ de hóu lóng.
sentences.translation: I don't like to eat too brittle fried chicken skin, it will prick my throat.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我爱吃这家店的炸薯条，因为它外酥里脆，味道好极了。
sentences.traditionalText: 我愛吃這家店的炸薯條，因為它外酥裡脆，味道好極了。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ ài chī zhèjiā diàn de zhá shǔ tiáo, yīnwèi tā wài sū lǐ cuì, wèidào hǎo jíle.
sentences.translation: I love the french fries at this store because they are crispy on the outside and inside, and the taste is fantastic.

sentences.pinyin: nǐ de shēng yīn hěn cuì.
sentences.translation: Your voice is loud and clear.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在人群中，我能很清晰地听到她的声音，因为她的声音是那么的脆。
sentences.traditionalText: 在人群中，我能很清晰地聽到她的聲音，因為她的聲音是那麼的脆。
sentences.pinyin: zài rén qún zhōng, wǒ néng hěn qīng xī de tīng dào tā de shēng yīn, yīn wéi tā de shēng yīn shì nà me de cuì.
sentences.translation: In the crowd, I can hear her voice very clearly, because her voice is so clear and loud.
